title: Web developer internship
description:
This is a remote position.
   

  

* Web Experience: Develop and maintain the Mytravaly web platform, focusing on responsive design and SEO\\-friendly performance.
* Architecture: Implement clean, maintainable code using the BLoC pattern to share logic between our web and mobile platforms.
* API Connectivity: Work closely with backend teams to test and integrate HTTPS protocols and JSON data streams.
* Testing: Lead the technical screening of web features using Postman before every release cycle.
* Collaboration: Use Git for version control and participate in daily Agile stand\\-ups to drive product sprints.


**Requirements**
* Tech Stack: Strong proficiency in Dart \\& Flutter with a focus on web deployment and responsive layouts.
* Data Handling: Expertise in REST APIs and managing real\\-time data with Firebase.
* Problem Solving: Exceptional attention to detail, specifically in resolving cross\\-browser compatibility issues.
* Environment: Comfortable with the "builder" culture of a startup; able to pivot quickly based on user feedback.

title: Web Developer Intern
description:
**Web Developer Intern (Unpaid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web interfaces
* Integrate APIs and manage efficient client–server communication
* Optimize websites for performance, speed, and SEO best practices
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure a smooth user experience



**Requirements** 



* Currently pursuing or completed a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with basic knowledge of frontend frameworks
* Familiarity with backend technologies such as Node.js, Python (Flask/Django), or PHP
* Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB and Git version control
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world web projects with live deployment
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers
* Opportunity to build a strong, professional web development portfolio
* Networking and placement assistance post\\-internship
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

title: Validation Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
 As a
 **SoC Functional Validation Engineer** 
 , you will be responsible for functional validation and bring\\-up of advanced SoC platforms across pre\\-silicon and post\\-silicon environments. This role involves hands\\-on debugging, test development, and collaboration across multiple engineering disciplines.
   

  

 This is a
 **6\\-month contract role** 
 with a strong possibility of extension.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Perform functional validation of new SoC designs featuring high\\-end ARM processors.
* Execute SoC bring\\-up and validation of key interfaces including:
* LPDDR, Ethernet, PCIe, HBM
* CPUs and Coherent Mesh
* Low\\-speed IOs (UART, I2C, I3C, SPI)
* Develop and execute bare\\-metal C test cases.
* Debug and validate designs using FPGA HAPS / Zebu emulation platforms, followed by silicon\\-based target hardware.
* Design and implement test infrastructure to support SoC validation activities.
* Collaborate with Architects, RTL Verification, Electrical Testing \\& Characterization, and Production Firmware teams throughout the validation lifecycle.


**Essential Skills**
* Strong proficiency in Embedded C programming.
* Hands\\-on experience with ARM high\\-end CPUs and cache\\-coherent interconnect protocols.
* Experience with high\\-speed interfaces and protocols such as:
* PCIe Gen6
* Die\\-to\\-die links
* LPDDR5
* HBM3
* Proven experience in pre\\-silicon and post\\-silicon SoC validation environments.


**Desirable Skills**
* Python scripting for automation and test support.
* Experience with Silicon SoC bring\\-up.
* Development of high\\-speed interface device drivers.


**Candidate Requirements**
* Candidates must provide a self\\-rating for the required technical skills.
* Please clearly mention relevant projects that align closely with this role and responsibilities.


**What We Offer**
* Challenging Work: Be part of cutting\\-edge SoC validation programs for a leading semiconductor client.
* Contract Opportunity: 6\\-month contract with strong potential for extension.
* High\\-Impact Role: Opportunity to work on next\\-generation ARM\\-based SoC platforms.


**Interview Process**
 The interview process will typically include:
   

  

* One or two rounds of technical interviews
* A final project or stakeholder discussion, if required


**How To Apply**
 If you are an experienced
 **SoC Functional Validation Engineer** 
 with strong ARM and high\\-speed interface validation experience, we’d love to hear from you.

title: AI QA/Testing Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
* Position: AI QA/Testing Engineer
* Location: Hyderabad
* Experience: 5 to 8 years
* Employment Type: contract


**Company Name: Pozent Technologies**
* Pozent is a rapidly growing company focused on delivering next\\-generation digital, data, and AI\\-driven solutions to global clients and achieve measurable business outcomes.
* Our team is geared towards innovation and thrives where talent meets opportunity.
* We work on Generative AI, Cloud, Data Engineering, Automation, and Full\\-Stack Development, delivering impactful projects


**Why join us:**
* Exciting Global Projects and career growth: Work directly with top clients and cutting\\-edge technologies providing a rapid learning curve, skill development, and clear career progression.
* Innovation Culture and supportive environment: You are not just joining a company — you’re becoming part of a dynamic innovation ecosystem that empowers you to learn, explore, create, grow and lead.


**Role Overview:**
 Ensure quality, fairness, and reliability of AI/ML models through comprehensive testing, validation, and automation. Focus on model performance, bias detection, and ethical AI practices.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design and execute test strategies for AI/ML models and systems
* Perform model validation including accuracy, robustness, and performance testing
* Conduct bias and fairness testing to identify and mitigate discriminatory outcomes
* Develop automated testing frameworks for continuous model evaluation
* Test data pipelines, feature engineering, and model inference systems
* Create test cases for edge cases, adversarial inputs, and model behavior analysis
* Monitor model drift and performance degradation in production
* Collaborate with ML engineers and data scientists to ensure model quality standards


**Requirements:**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or related field
* Strong experience in model validation and ML testing methodologies
* Proven expertise in bias and fairness testing for AI systems
* Hands\\-on experience with test automation frameworks and tools
* Understanding of ML model evaluation metrics and statistical testing
* Proficiency in Python and testing libraries (pytest, unit test)
* Knowledge of AI ethics, responsible AI principles, and regulatory requirements
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git)


**Preferred:**
* Experience testing various ML models (LLMs, computer vision, NLP, recommender systems)
* Familiarity with fairness metrics (demographic parity, equalized odds, disparate impact)
* Knowledge of adversarial testing and model robustness evaluation
* Experience with A/B testing and experimental design
* Understanding of data quality testing and validation
* Familiarity with ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit\\-learn)
* Experience with monitoring tools (MLflow, Weights \\& Biases, Evidently AI)
* Knowledge of GDPR, AI Act, or other AI governance frameworks
* should be strong in Python \\& must have done testing on AI \\& Gen AI projects


**Why This Role:**
* Ensures reliable and high\\-performing AI models through rigorous testing, validation, and automation to prevent production issues.
* Promotes fair and ethical AI by detecting bias early and enforcing responsible, transparent AI practices.

description:

 A day in the life of an Infoscion
   

  

* As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high\\-quality and value\\-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages\\- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment.
* You will review the proposals prepared by consultants, provide guidance, and analyze the solutions defined for the client business problems to identify any potential risks and issues.

* You would be a key contributor in unit\\-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high\\-quality, value\\-adding consulting solutions to customers adhering to the guidelines and processes of the organization. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!
* Good knowledge on software configuration management systems

title: ServiceNow ITSM Developer
description:
**Industry \\& Sector:** 
 Staffing and IT talent solutions serving enterprise technology organizations across IT Service Management (ITSM), cloud operations, and digital transformation programs. We place and manage technical professionals who design, implement, and support mission\\-critical ServiceNow platforms for large enterprises.
   

  

**Primary Job Title (standardized):** 
 ServiceNow Developer
   

  

**Location:** 
 India (On\\-site)
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 We are recruiting for an experienced ServiceNow ITSM Developer to join a client\\-facing delivery team responsible for implementing and enhancing ServiceNow ITSM capabilities. This role focuses on building scalable, secure, and maintainable ServiceNow solutions that improve IT operations, incident and change management, and end\\-user experiences.
   

  

 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

* Design, develop and configure ServiceNow ITSM modules (Incident, Problem, Change, Request) using platform best practices.
* Author server\\-side and client\\-side scripts (Business Rules, Script Includes, UI Actions, Client Scripts) and optimize GlideRecord queries for performance.
* Develop and maintain Service Portal components, widgets and custom UI to deliver intuitive end\\-user experiences.
* Integrate ServiceNow with external systems using REST/SOAP APIs, IntegrationHub spokes, and MID Server\\-based integrations.
* Implement Flow Designer workflows, orchestration where required, and manage Update Sets, application scoping, and release artifacts.
* Collaborate with architects, testers and stakeholders to produce design documents, unit tests, and operational runbooks; troubleshoot production issues and apply fixes.


**Skills \\& Qualifications**
 Must\\-Have
   

  

* Proven experience delivering ServiceNow ITSM implementations in production environments.
* Strong JavaScript proficiency and practical experience with GlideRecord and ServiceNow APIs.
* Hands\\-on experience building Service Portal widgets and customizing Service Portal UI.
* Experience using Flow Designer and IntegrationHub for workflow and integration development.
* Practical experience integrating using REST APIs and working with MID Server for on\\-prem integrations.
* Familiarity with Update Sets, application scopes, ACLs, and platform upgrade considerations.


**Preferred**
* ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) or certified Implementation Specialist (ITSM).
* Experience with Discovery, Orchestration, or ITOM modules.
* Exposure to CI/CD pipelines for ServiceNow and automated testing frameworks.


 Benefits \\& Culture Highlights
   

  

* Opportunity to work on enterprise\\-scale ServiceNow implementations and grow technical expertise.
* Collaborative, delivery\\-focused environment with access to mentoring and certification support.
* On\\-site role with client\\-facing exposure and clear performance\\-driven progression.


 To apply, please ensure you can work on\\-site in India and include a concise summary of your ServiceNow project experience, key modules implemented, and any platform certifications held.

title: Lead Engineer – TypeScript / Node.js
description:
**Job Title: Lead Engineer – TypeScript / Node.js** 




**Experience \\- 8\\+ Years** 




  





**About the Role** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled
 **Lead Engineer** 
 to drive the design and development of
 **service\\-domain architectures** 
 for enterprise\\-scale applications. This role is hands\\-on and requires strong expertise in
 **TypeScript (Node.js)** 
 , cloud‑native engineering, and microservices best practices. You will help shape technical direction, mentor engineering teams, and ensure solution excellence within a regulated
 **financial services** 
 environment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Lead the development of
 **scalable, secure, and reliable microservices** 
 within a defined service domain using TypeScript (Node.js).
* Implement
 **cloud‑native solutions** 
 on AWS, including Lambda, Aurora PostgreSQL, and MSK (Kafka).
* Collaborate with architects, product managers, and engineering teams to translate business requirements into
 **robust technical designs** 
 .
* Drive engineering best practices such as
 **CI/CD (GitHub Actions)** 
 , automated testing, code quality, and performance optimization.
* Mentor and guide team members to uplift technical capability and foster a culture of continuous improvement.
* Participate in architectural reviews, solution designs, and contribute to engineering roadmaps aligned with organizational standards.
* Ensure compliance with
 **security** 
 , regulatory requirements, and data privacy standards.
* Work within
 **Agile/Scrum** 
 delivery frameworks to support iterative, high‑quality development cycles.



**Tech Stack \\& Tools** 



* **Languages:** 
 TypeScript (Node.js), .NET / Java
* **Cloud:** 
 AWS (Lambda, Aurora PostgreSQL, Serverless Framework)
* **Integration:** 
 Kafka (MSK)
* **CI/CD:** 
 GitHub Actions
* **Containers \\& Orchestration:** 
 Docker, Kubernetes
* **Dev Tools:** 
 Visual Studio Code, UML Modelling
* **Design Patterns:** 
 Circuit Breaker, Event‑Driven Architecture



  





**Required Qualifications \\& Skills** 



* **8\\+ years** 
 of experience in software engineering, with
 **2–3 years in a lead role** 
 .
* Strong experience in
 **microservices architecture** 
 , REST APIs, and service domain design.
* Hands\\-on expertise in
 **TypeScript (Node.js)** 
 and/or
 **.NET Core** 
 .
* Solid understanding of
 **AWS services** 
 , particularly serverless architectures.
* Experience with
 **event\\-driven systems** 
 and asynchronous messaging (
 **Kafka preferred** 
 ).
* Familiarity with
 **CI/CD automation** 
 and DevOps engineering practices.
* Prior experience in
 **Agile/Scrum** 
 environments; exposure to financial services is a plus.
* Good understanding of
 **Domain\\-Driven Design (DDD)** 
 and modern architectural patterns.
* Exposure to frontend frameworks using
 **TypeScript** 
 is advantageous.



  





  





***S YNECHRON’S DIVERSITY \\& INCLUSION STATEMENT***




  





 Diversity \\& Inclusion are fundamental to our culture, and Synechron is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. Our Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiative ‘Same Difference’ is committed to fostering an inclusive culture – promoting equality, diversity and an environment that is respectful to all. We strongly believe that a diverse workforce helps build stronger, successful businesses as a global company. We encourage applicants from across diverse backgrounds, race, ethnicities, religion, age, marital status, gender, sexual orientations, or disabilities to apply. We empower our global workforce by offering flexible workplace arrangements, mentoring, internal mobility, learning and development programs, and more.
 



  





 All employment decisions at Synechron are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to the applicant’s gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: ServiceNow ITSM Developer
description:
**Industry \\& Sector:** 
 Staffing and IT talent solutions serving enterprise technology organizations across IT Service Management (ITSM), cloud operations, and digital transformation programs. We place and manage technical professionals who design, implement, and support mission\\-critical ServiceNow platforms for large enterprises.
   

  

**Primary Job Title (standardized):** 
 ServiceNow Developer
   

  

**Location:** 
 India (On\\-site)
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 We are recruiting for an experienced ServiceNow ITSM Developer to join a client\\-facing delivery team responsible for implementing and enhancing ServiceNow ITSM capabilities. This role focuses on building scalable, secure, and maintainable ServiceNow solutions that improve IT operations, incident and change management, and end\\-user experiences.
   

  

 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

* Design, develop and configure ServiceNow ITSM modules (Incident, Problem, Change, Request) using platform best practices.
* Author server\\-side and client\\-side scripts (Business Rules, Script Includes, UI Actions, Client Scripts) and optimize GlideRecord queries for performance.
* Develop and maintain Service Portal components, widgets and custom UI to deliver intuitive end\\-user experiences.
* Integrate ServiceNow with external systems using REST/SOAP APIs, IntegrationHub spokes, and MID Server\\-based integrations.
* Implement Flow Designer workflows, orchestration where required, and manage Update Sets, application scoping, and release artifacts.
* Collaborate with architects, testers and stakeholders to produce design documents, unit tests, and operational runbooks; troubleshoot production issues and apply fixes.


**Skills \\& Qualifications**
 Must\\-Have
   

  

* Proven experience delivering ServiceNow ITSM implementations in production environments.
* Strong JavaScript proficiency and practical experience with GlideRecord and ServiceNow APIs.
* Hands\\-on experience building Service Portal widgets and customizing Service Portal UI.
* Experience using Flow Designer and IntegrationHub for workflow and integration development.
* Practical experience integrating using REST APIs and working with MID Server for on\\-prem integrations.
* Familiarity with Update Sets, application scopes, ACLs, and platform upgrade considerations.


**Preferred**
* ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) or certified Implementation Specialist (ITSM).
* Experience with Discovery, Orchestration, or ITOM modules.
* Exposure to CI/CD pipelines for ServiceNow and automated testing frameworks.


 Benefits \\& Culture Highlights
   

  

* Opportunity to work on enterprise\\-scale ServiceNow implementations and grow technical expertise.
* Collaborative, delivery\\-focused environment with access to mentoring and certification support.
* On\\-site role with client\\-facing exposure and clear performance\\-driven progression.


 To apply, please ensure you can work on\\-site in India and include a concise summary of your ServiceNow project experience, key modules implemented, and any platform certifications held.

title: SAP Integration Suite / Software Engineer
description:
**Software Engineer \\-SAP Integration Suite**
**INDIA**
 The SAP CPI Developer will be a part of the Shared Services team and will have several key responsibilities:
   

  

* Interacting with key business users, project stakeholders, technical and functional consultants gathering the integration business requirements.
* Involve in integration design, development, configuration, deployment and documentation.
* Prepare integration requirement document, data mapping document for every interface by understanding the functional requirements.
* Implement prepackaged integrations between SAP or non\\-SAP Cloud based tools to SAP S/4HANA.
* Demonstrates the ability to translate business needs into technical architecture requirements and understands the long\\-term and short\\-term perspectives of an IT investment situation
* Support and promote integration relationships between IT and business functions


**Qualifications:**
* At least 5\\+ years of in SAP CPI (aka Integration suite) , SAP SuccessFactors integration Center, SAP PI, and BTP platform
* Strong experience in SAP IC and SAP CPI integrations design, development and deployment
* Expertise in building complex integration processes , integrating cloud\\-based and on\\-premise enterprise applications.
* Expertise in integrating salesforce with SAP and other applications,
* Strong experience in working in complex mapping logic using Java script and Groovy script
* Expertise in configuring sender \\& Receiver adapter \\-IDOC, SAP SuccessFactors, salesforce, FTP, SFTP, JDBC, Mail, ODATA, REST and SOAP Web service and HTTP.
* Experience in Event Mesh \\- Event Driven Architecture
* Experience in SAP Cloud Connector configurations and troubleshooting
* Must have experience in building mapping logics using standard mapping functions and custom mapping functions
* Should have experience in implementing pre\\-packaged integrations between salesforce and other applications
* Work with technical teams, third party system teams and functional team to perform end to end integration testing, unit testing and integration testing,
* Very strong debugging and problem\\-solving skills with excellent understanding of system development methodologies , techniques and tools.
* Experience in the global implementations from scope study to go\\-live and go\\-live support.
* Certification in SAP CPI would be Preferred.
* Should have very good communication skills.
* Should have good experience in working with different cross functional teams.
* Experience in at least 1 \\-2 full implementation projects

title: Founding Full-Stack AI Engineer – High Caliber Exceptional Talent Only
description:
🚀
 **Founding Software Engineer \\- AI\\-powered Full\\-stack (Python, React Next.js, AWS)** 




 📍
 **Hyderabad (Hybrid)** 
 \\| Remote to start (India)
 



 🏢
 **Airawath \\| Early\\-Stage Consumer AI Startup** 




 💼
 **Full\\-time \\| High Ownership \\| Founding Team Role** 




 Airawath is building a next\\-generation consumer experience that blends AI\\-driven personalization, intelligent recommendations, creative automation, and modern celebration workflows. We're on a mission to redefine how people discover meaningful gifts, create invitations, and connect through technology.
 



 We are hiring our
 **Founding Software Engineers** 
 — someone who is exceptional, product\\-driven, and excited to build modern consumer applications from the ground up.
 



 This role is ideal for engineers who love ownership, move fast, think deeply, and want to help shape an ambitious AI\\-first product.
 



  





 ⭐
 **What You Will Build** 




 You will work directly with the founder and CTO to build core components of the Airawath platform:
 



**1\\. AI/ML Personalization \\& Recommendation Systems** 



* Semantic search \\& embeddings
* Gift recommendation logic
* Ranking \\& personalization algorithms
* LLM\\-driven conversational flows
* AI\\-assisted user profiling



**2\\. Consumer Features (Web/Mobile)** 



* E\\-invitation templates \\& workflows
* Social\\-style interactions (feeds, interests, sharing)
* Event \\& celebration flows
* User dashboards, preferences, and onboarding



**3\\. Creative Graphic Automation** 



* Template generation engines
* Prompt → design generation
* Canvas rendering (Fabric.js / WebGL)
* Dynamic design tools \\& interactive editors
* Lottie/SVG asset manipulation



**4\\. Backend, API \\& Cloud Architecture** 



* Python\\-based APIs (FastAPI/Django)
* Event\\-driven architecture
* Optimized database models
* AWS deployment \\& infra
* Scalable, clean service design



 You will be responsible for delivering high\\-quality, reliable, and scalable features end to end.
 



  





 🎯
 **Who We're Looking For** 




 We are hiring
 **top\\-tier engineering talent** 
 with:
 



 ✔ Strong technical depth
 



 ✔ Sound judgment \\& clarity of thought
 



 ✔ High ownership \\& initiative
 



 ✔ Ability to work in fast\\-paced environments
 



 ✔ Passion for building consumer experiences
 



 ✔ Startup mindset and willingness to learn quickly
 



 You don’t need to have done all of this before — but you must be capable, motivated, and excited to build at a high standard.
 



  





 🧠
 **Required Technical Skills** 




 You must be strong in most of the following:
 



**AI/ML \\+ Data** 



* Experience with recommendation systems, embeddings,
 **ranking** 
 models
* LLM integration (OpenAI/Anthropic/HuggingFace)
* Vector search (Pinecone / Weaviate / Milvus / FAISS)
* Semantic search \\& personalization logic



**Backend (Python)** 



* Python (FastAPI / Django / Flask)
* Building high\\-quality APIs
* Authentication, user flows, session management
* Event\\-driven services, queues (Redis/Kafka optional)
* AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB/RDS, CloudWatch)



**Frontend (React)** 



* React.js / Next.js
* Component\\-level design
* Responsive UI
* Strong UX intuition
* Pixel\\-perfect implementation



**Creative Automation (Bonus)** 




 Experience in at least one is a strong plus:
 


* HTML5 Canvas
* WebGL
* Fabric.js / Konva.js
* Lottie animations
* SVG pipelines
* Generative design tools



 🧩
 **Soft Skills \\& Culture Fit** 




 We value people who:
 


* Take ownership and follow through
* Communicate clearly and work transparently
* Are structured in thinking and execution
* Can balance speed with quality
* Thrive in an early\\-stage startup environment
* Are flexible, reliable, and proactive
* Bring curiosity, creativity, and high standards
* Work exclusively with full commitment (no freelancing)



 We aim to build a culture of excellence, focus, and continuous improvement — without politics or unnecessary complexity.
 



 🎓
 **Preferred Background** 




 Not mandatory, but great to have:
 


* Experience at a fast\\-moving tech startup
* Degree in Computer Science/Engineering from a reputed top tech institution
* Experience building AI\\-powered consumer apps
* Exposure to design tools, creative automation, or visual editors



 💰
 **Compensation** 



* **Salary:** 
 Competitive \\& based on experience (₹12–21 LPA)
* **Equity:** 
 Offered as part of the founding team (will be discussed after a year of journey)
* **Experience:** 
 3–6 years preferred
* **Role:** 
 Full\\-time, core engineering team
* **Probation:** 
 Standard 90\\-day evaluation period



  





 📩
